about_the_game:
Unique Tower Defense + RPG Dual perspectives Gameplay:

  • Third - person (Tower Defense view) : Players can automatic attacks, build defense towers, and observe the movement routes of monsters.

  • First - person (RPG view) : This perspective increases the player's basic attack power and enables them to cast skills.

Diverse Qimen Mechanisms:

  • Jing(景): It can alter the terrain, thus changing the monsters' advancing paths.

  • Shang(伤): It can destroy the monsters' base, halting the progress of one group of monsters.

  • Kai(开): It can move the base of the defense tower, achieving the effect of assisting in defense.

  • There are also other Qimen mechanisms waiting for you to explore.

Abundant Character Upgrade and Enhancement Methods:

  • Talent System: Based on the rewards from daytime or nighttime levels, players can obtain different enhancement directions for either the defense towers or the characters themselves.

  • Forging System: With three sets of weapons, players can enjoy a different gaming experience in each level.

  • Alchemy System: It provides additional skill points or an opportunity to reselect talents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660/AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/ AMD Radeon RX 580

short_description: Players take on the role of a patrol officer. By chance, you uncover the monster invasion and get involved in battles to defend against the monsters, you can utilize a variety of strange Qimen mechanisms, Coupled with the unique skills they gradually acquire, can you safeguard this continent?
